attributes.action: Abolish the titles of "The Honourable or Right Honourable" for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sorry to the truely honourable members, but far too many members are patently not honourable. Perhaps the honourific could be returned in ten years if they all earn it back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
